author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
Base metals slip, akin to goats on a fall,
Dollar strength, a hound that gives a bawl.
Demand is faint, a rabbit's tentative call,
Golden safe lowly snail, soon to enthrall.

Natural gas, prancing deer ever strong,
Rises high, with the songbird's dawn song.
Israel's supply, where might it belong?
Anxiety mounts, a discord in the throng.

Oil, the dog that has lost its way,
Pares gains while shadows of risk sway.
Israel's plight, a mournful day,
Stability sought, in future’s gray fray.

feedItems.title: Base Metals Slip Amid Dollar Strength
feedItems.description: Base metals prices pulled back as weak demand and dollar strength pressured industrial goods, while gold was higher as the fighting in Israel and Palestine boosted its safe-haven appeal.

feedItems.title: Natural Gas Continues Rise Over Israel Supply Worries
feedItems.description: Natural gas prices continued pushing higher, rising another 5% on worries over supply in Israel.

feedItems.title: Oil Pares Gains Though Upside Risks Remain
feedItems.description: Oil futures were lower in a likely technical correction after settling more than 4% higher on Monday on worries over the situation in Israel and Palestine.

author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
The Fed speaketh, a tempest may sweep,
Coin of the realm wavers at their decree,
Fickle winds that sway the deep,
'Twill be ocean's sway or Admiral's glee.

Eurozone bonds, unyielding as stone,
Yet safe sanctuary in tumult's hold.
'Tis upon Columbus' shores, truths be shown,
Both tales of valor and treachery unfold.

Behold Huawei, glowing heart of the East,
A dragon's demand doth investors entreat.
In this robust feast, even as the least,
Against the mainland's decline, they compete.

feedItems.title: Fed Speeches Could Send Dollar in Either Direction
feedItems.description: Upcoming speeches by Fed officials on Tuesday could influence the dollar “in one way or the other,” Swissquote Bank said, as the currency started the day marginally higher.

feedItems.title: Eurozone Bond Yields Move Little, Safe Havens Remain Supported
feedItems.description: Eurozone government bond yields were little changed and the risk sentiment picture should become clearer as U.S. markets resume activity after the Columbus Day holiday, UniCredit Research said.

feedItems.title: Huawei Supplier Stocks Jump on Robust Product Demand
feedItems.description: Robust demand for Huawei products is fueling investor interest in the shares of its suppliers, which have bucked declines in the broader mainland Chinese equities market.

author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
Growth of sales, not steep, in U.K.'s retail halls,
By but 2.7 it did ascend, in the Autumn's cool squall.
Despite inflation's meek retreat, still the coinage falls,
Under pressure, households meet, the high living's toll.

Then rose the oil from Earth's depths, and stocks of war did climb,
After Israel suffered death, in its hardest time.
In these tremors that upset, the markets yet did shine,
S&P, Nasdaq, Dow, no plunging bells did chime.

Last, speaks the Chief of CNN, to his scribes across the land,
Our game must shift, and then again, for 'tis digital that stands.
The old TV, once our friend, can now no more command,
False equivalence, balance's end, distractions we must disband.

feedItems.title: U.K. Retail Sales Growth Slows
feedItems.description: U.K. retail sales for the five weeks to September 30 increased by 2.7%, slowing from the previous month, despite a drop in inflation, as the high cost of living continued to pressure households’ budgets.

feedItems.title: Oil prices and defense stocks climbed after the worst attack on Israel in decades shook financial markets. Major indexes rose, with the S&P 500 and Dow both gaining 0.6% and the Nasdaq adding 0.4%.
feedItems.description: Oil prices and defense stocks climbed after the worst attack on Israel in decades shook financial markets. Major indexes rose, with the S&P 500 and Dow both gaining 0.6% and the Nasdaq adding 0.4%.

feedItems.title: CNN Chief Executive Mark Thompson told staff that the network needs to step up its digital game, saying conventional TV "can no longer define us," and that its journalists shouldn't be distracted by debates about balance or false equivalency.
feedItems.description: CNN Chief Executive Mark Thompson told staff that the network needs to step up its digital game, saying conventional TV “can no longer define us,” and that its journalists shouldn’t be distracted by debates about balance or false equivalency.

author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
From wagon's wheel to smithy's forge, hear ye this tale dire,
Four-thousand guilded workers, in arms, they do retire.
On Mack’s own truck they turned their back, contract refused in ire,
Much like the ale, when turned too stale, fails to inspire.

In yonder East, a garden vast, known well for its gold bloom,
Now struggles in the waning light, in debt and facing doom.
Shares tumbled like the autumn leaves, in silence of the room,
Ale's head froths high, then falls to nigh, presaging an impending gloom.

In the realm where dragons dwell, a curious tale unfolds,
The people's coin clings tight to palm, no splendor it beholds.
Houses stand, unsought, unplanned, the market's warmth waned cold,
'Tis like the wine, when past his prime, a story told and retold.

feedItems.title: Nearly 4,000 members of the United Auto Workers went on strike at Volvo Group's Mack Trucks unit after rejecting a five-year contract proposal.
feedItems.description: Nearly 4,000 members of the United Auto Workers went on strike at Volvo Group’s Mack Trucks unit after rejecting a five-year contract proposal.

feedItems.title: Country Garden failed to make an international debt payment after the Chinese developer's apartment shares plunged in September, succumbing to a liquidity crisis that worsened over the past few months.
feedItems.description: Country Garden failed to make an international debt payment after the Chinese developer’s apartment shares plunged in September, succumbing to a liquidity crisis that worsened over the past few months.

feedItems.title: Chinese consumers spent and traveled less during the eight-day holiday that ended Friday than the government had projected, figures showed, while home sales in key cities were weaker than last year.
feedItems.description: Chinese consumers spent and traveled less during the eight-day holiday that ended Friday than the government had projected, figures showed, while home sales in key cities were weaker than last year.
